news.title: Nutri-slogan & poster making contest
news.description: Join the city-wide Nutri-slogan and poster making contest to promote healthy living and nutrition awareness.

news.title: Public Advisory: All face-to-face classes at ALL levels are suspended
news.description: Due to inclement weather, all face-to-face classes in Santa Rosa City are suspended today. Stay safe.

news.title: Nutriquiz contest
news.description: Test your knowledge in the annual Nutriquiz contest. Open to all high school students in the city.

news.title: Crowning Moments: Victors of Rosas ng Santa Rosa 2025
news.description: Relive the crowning moments of the Rosas ng Santa Rosa 2025 pageant and celebrate our new ambassadors.

news.title: Santa Rosa marks 21st cityhood with vibrant parade
news.description: The city celebrated its 21st Cityhood Anniversary with a grand parade showcasing the local culture and community spirit.

news.title: Gabay sa PWD ID Verification
news.description: A step-by-step guide for the verification process of PWD IDs to ensure all persons with disabilities can avail their benefits.

news.title: Libreng Anti-Rabies mass vaccination para sa buwan ng Hulyo 2025
news.description: The City Veterinary Office will conduct a free anti-rabies mass vaccination drive for the month of July. Protect your pets!

news.title: Celebrating the 111th Anniversary of Iglesia ni Cristo
news.description: The city joins the celebration of the 111th Anniversary of Iglesia ni Cristo, recognizing its contributions to the community.

news.title: Grand Graduation of Pabasa sa Nutrisyon
news.description: Congratulations to all the graduates of the Pabasa sa Nutrisyon program! A milestone in promoting nutrition education.

news.title: Happy 21st Cityhood Anniversary, Santa Rosa
news.description: Warmest greetings to all Rosenians on our 21st Cityhood Anniversary! Let's continue to work together for a progressive city.

upcomingEvents.title: Nutri-slogan & poster making contest
upcomingEvents.description: Showcase your creativity in the Nutri-slogan and poster making contest. A great way to promote health awareness.

upcomingEvents.title: NutriTiktok drama dance
upcomingEvents.description: Join the fun and exciting NutriTiktok drama dance competition. A modern twist to celebrating nutrition month.

upcomingEvents.title: 51st Nutrition Month Celebration
upcomingEvents.description: Join us for the culminating activity of the 51st Nutrition Month with various fun and educational activities for the whole family.

announcements.title: City-wide Cleanup Drive this Weekend
announcements.description: Join the city-wide cleanup drive on Saturday to maintain the cleanliness of our community. Your participation is highly encouraged.

announcements.title: New Traffic Scheme Implementation
announcements.description: A new traffic scheme will be implemented starting next month to ease congestion on major roads. Please be guided accordingly.

announcements.title: Business Permit Renewal Deadline
announcements.description: The deadline for business permit renewal is fast approaching. Renew now to avoid penalties and continue your business operations smoothly.
